name: beartest-vscode
description: VSCode Test Explorer integration for beartest-js

beartest.testFilePattern.description: Glob patterns for discovering test files

beartest.runtimeArgs.description: Additional arguments passed to the runtime before the test script (e.g., ['--require', './test-setup.js'])

pattern.description: Glob pattern to match test file paths (e.g., 'packages/frontend/**', 'backend/**/*.test.ts')

runtimeArgs.description: Additional arguments passed to the runtime before the test script

cwd.description: Optional working directory override (relative to workspace root)

beartest.configurations.description: Array of configuration patterns for running tests in different environments (useful for monorepos). Each test file is matched against patterns in order, and the first match is used.
beartest.configurations.markdownDescription:
Array of configuration patterns for running tests in different environments.

Useful for monorepos where different packages need different runtime configurations.

Example:
```json
[
  {
    "pattern": "packages/frontend/**",
    "command": "bun",
    "runtimeArgs": ["--preload", "./setup.ts"]
  },
  {
    "pattern": "packages/backend/**",
    "command": "node",
    "runtimeArgs": ["--require", "./test-setup.js"]
  }
]
```
